comments.text: Bug 576970 introduces a new optional customizable toolbar button for Sync which initially doesn't fit optimally (only 32x32 and 16x16 sizes provided). While Modern might get addressed in bug 612172 and Mac in bug 628404, this bug is here to ensure that in the end the button fits well with the default customizable toolbar icons (at least regarding size, margin and label placement) of the Default theme (big and small icons).
comments.creator: jh@junetz.de
